title: LoL client wont start

replies.body:
Hey there,

Have you tried [reinstalling League of Legends](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202539040-Reinstalling-League-of-Legends)?
No i haven't, i was going to but i want try every possible solution before reinstalling because reinstalling at 100 Kb/s isnt good
